recipes.label: Find Morland's shop
recipes.startdescription: The directions to Morland's shop are cryptic. When one deals in the kind of books my correspondent studied, one must be circumspect.
recipes.description: An ill-lit street at an ill-favoured bend in a lesser river. A soft yellow light through a grimy window. Miss Morland nods as I enter, but doesn't rise. 'I never ask the names of my clients,' she informs me, before I have time to introduce myself. [Explore is unlocked.]
recipes.comments: This is one way the Explore verb may be opened.

recipes.label: Explore
recipes.description: Now that I've found a location, I can EXPLORE it.
